statements: SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_preferences;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE audio_preference = TRUE;
SELECT player_name, audio_preference, graphics_preference FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, audio_preference, graphics_preference FROM player_preferences WHERE graphics_preference = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_preferences WHERE audio_preference = true AND graphics_preference = false;
SELECT player_name, graphics_preference FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM player_preferences WHERE audio_preference = false OR graphics_preference = true;
SELECT player_id, player_name, audio_preference FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_score BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM players JOIN customization ON players.player_id = customization.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_level DESC
SELECT * FROM players JOIN customization ON players.player_id = customization.player_id WHERE customization_id < 10 ORDER BY player_id ASC
SELECT MAX(player_score) AS highest_score, player_name FROM players GROUP BY player_name

SELECT player_name, COUNT(customization_id) AS num_customizations FROM players LEFT JOIN customization ON players.player_id = customization.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING num_customizations > 0
SELECT SUM(player_score) AS total_score, AVG(player_level) AS avg_level FROM players
SELECT * FROM player_preferences;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_preferences;
SELECT option_id, option_name, description, price FROM customization_options WHERE price > 50;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM player_preferences WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, option_name, equipped FROM player_customization ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY option_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, option_name, equipped FROM player_customization WHERE player_id = 2 AND equipped = TRUE;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM player_preferences WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT p.username, c.option_name FROM player_preferences p JOIN player_customization pc ON p.player_id = pc.player_id JOIN customization_options c ON pc.option_id = c.option_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE theme_color IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_name, level_name FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN game_levels ON player_progress.level_id = game_levels.level_id;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players;
SELECT * FROM customization_options WHERE theme_color = 'blue';
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, level_id, completed FROM player_progress WHERE completed = TRUE AND level_id > 3;

SELECT player_name, level_name, level_difficulty FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id JOIN game_levels ON player_progress.level_id = game_levels.level_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, player_score FROM players WHERE player_level = 10;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC, player_level ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_level_requirement < 50 ORDER BY item_type ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 5;
SELECT player_id, health_points, attack_points, defense_points, magic_points FROM player_stats WHERE health_points > 500 AND attack_points < 200 AND magic_points <> 0;
SELECT player_id, sound_volume, music_volume, control_type FROM player_settings WHERE language = 'English';
